meta.description: Optimize transportation options to minimize pollution while meeting product delivery requirements.

params.name: pollution_per_trip
params.description: Pollution generated per trip by each transportation option.

params.name: capacity_per_trip
params.description: Capacity of products each transportation option can carry per trip.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each transportation option.

vars.name: use_van_or_ev
vars.description: Binary variable to ensure only one of vans or electric vehicles is used.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(pollution_per_trip[o] * trips[o] for o in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution generated by all trips.

constraints.name: total_pollution_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(pollution_per_trip[o] * trips[o] for o in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
constraints.description: Total pollution generated by all trips must not exceed 2000 units.

constraints.name: trucks_minimum_usage
constraints.description: Trucks must be used at least 10 times.

constraints.name: total_products_transport
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity_per_trip[o] * trips[o] for o in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
constraints.description: The total quantity of products transported must be at least 1800 units.

constraints.name: van_or_ev_exclusive
constraints.description: Only one of vans or electric vehicles can be used.
